My Dear Friends, I, SANI EMMANUEL, sincerely thank you all for your exceptional words of encouragement and selfless support during the Outstanding Global Youth Ambassador of the Year exercise. Your thoughtfulness and kindness are rare, I'm humbled and grateful for this act of kindness, IT MEANS A LOT TO ME. I'm glad and to announce to you that your support was not in vain as I have through your endless support bagged the Prestigious Outstanding Global Youth Ambassador of the year award. I appreciate your determination in showing me I can do it! Thanking you for the support and love! ‚ù§Ô∏è + üí° Most importantly to my fellow GYA nominees Iswat Taiwo Badmus, Nigeria, Simbiat Oladoja, Nigeria, Bushra Farooq, India, Ahmed Oueslati, Tunisia, Fontoh Desmond Abinwi, Cameroun, All Global Youth Ambassadors, and Others advocating for the betterment of humanity & realization of the Sustainable Development Goals, I say a hearty congratulations to us all, WE ARE ALL WINNERS. Thank you once again!... ¬© SANI EMMANUEL OGYA, 2020 Theirworld See link - https://lnkd.in/dPabXrY #sdg4 #sdgs #sdg2030 #education #childrights #earlychildhoodeducation #earlyeducation #earlyliteracy #earlylearning #un #children #earlychildhooddevelopment
